类的使用
interact.GameStage

  • 使用GameStage的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    display  
    element  
    interact.controller  

    • display中GameStage的使用

      参数类型为GameStage的display中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      void GameApp.createEasyWorld​(GameStage bg, javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Generates the easy world based current GameStage and Stage.
      void GameApp.createNewWorld​(GameStage bg2, javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Generates the secret world based current GameStage and Stage.
      void GameApp.createNormalWorld​(GameStage bg, javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Generates the normal world based current GameStage and Stage.
      void GameApp.endAndDigit​(GameStage bg)
      Display the element End and score in game stage.
      void GameApp.healthPoint​(GameStage bg)
      Display the health point.
      void GameApp.stageDisplay​(GameStage bg, javafx.stage.Stage stage, java.lang.String music)
      Display time bar, animal and play corresponding music.
      参数类型为GameStage的display中的构造器 
      构造器 说明
      GameApp​(GameStage bg)
      Instantiates a new game app.
      KeepScore​(Animal animal, javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, java.lang.String music, GameStage background)
      Input Animal, Stage, Music.

    • element中GameStage的使用

      参数类型为GameStage的element中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      void Actor.disPlay​(GameStage bg)
      Display actors with current background inputed.
      void Actor.disPlay​(java.lang.String gameLevel, GameStage background)
      Display different actors with game level inputed.
      void Boat.disPlay​(GameStage background)
      Inherit this method from Actor to generate pre-defined Boat.
      void Gangartuar.disPlay​(GameStage background)
      Display the Gangartuar.
      void Log.disPlay​(GameStage background)
      Inherit this method from Actor to generate pre-defined Log.
      void Obstacle.disPlay​(java.lang.String gameLevel, GameStage background)
      Inherit this method from Actor to generate pre-defined car and Truck.
      void Portal.disPlay​(GameStage background)
      Method to display Protal in game.
      void Shark.disPlay​(GameStage bg)
      Inherit this method from Actor to generate pre-defined Shark.
      void Turtle.disPlay​(GameStage background)
      Inherit this method from Actor to generate pre-defined Turtle.
      void Zombie.disPlay​(GameStage background)
      Inherit this method from Actor to generate pre-defined Log.
      static void Portal.startTimer​(GameStage background)
      Start timer.
      参数类型为GameStage的element中的构造器 
      构造器 说明
      Animal​(GameStage background)
      Instantiates a frogger within the current background.

    • interact.controller中GameStage的使用

      参数类型为GameStage的interact.controller中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      void LevelController.generateWorld​(GameStage background, javafx.scene.control.Button button, java.lang.String gameLevel)
